item.description:
First Friday
Friday May 6th.
anytime between
7:00 — 9:30 pm
Boston Museum of fine Arts
Avenue of the Arts
465 Huntington Avenue,
Boston, MA 02115-5597
(617) 267-9300
Special Events
mfafirstfridays Koch Gallery

Host: Steve Obermiller 603-491-1962 ob@tds.net
Carpooling from Nashua at 5:30 pm..
Then Lowell, Burlington on down.
Open to visitors 21 years or older.
Members: entry is FREE
Nonmembers: entry is FREE with Museum admission $20.
Also: Free or discount tickets may be found at your local library.

     Steve O. and friends would like the honor of your company as they enjoy drinks on a stroll through these magnificent galleries. There will be a live jazz band, an open bar. and food for sale. The food is not very good and pricey. But, if you enjoy museums? You will find it even better with a glass of wine or a cocktail, as you view the works of art around you.
Can't make at 7:00? Then join us anytime until 9:30. The event starts at 5:30 pm.. But, Steve O can not make it any sooner than 7.  Call for more info. on carpooling of finding us.
The Museum wrote:
Begin each month in a unique and stylish atmosphere at mfafirstfridays. Join us in the Koch Gallery for fine art, live music, cash bars featuring a signature cocktail, and delicious tapas. Relax and unwind in the breathtaking ambience with friends both old and new.

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Boston Museum of Arts First Friday
